shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dawit “Psalter” (fols. 2r-146vb) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David” (fols. 2r-116r) I-2) Mäḫalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets” (fols. 116r-128v) I-3) Mäḫalǝyä mäḫalǝy “Song of Songs” (fols. 128v-134v) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam “The Praise of Mary” (fols. 135ra-143ra) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light” (fols. 143ra-146vb)
Additiones 1-3.

donors.donor: According to Additio 1, the Ms. was donated by wäyzäro Wälättä Śǝllase.

txstates.txstate: The front board attachement has been crudely repaired. The tailband is partly detached. Many fols. are stained with wax. Fol. 110 is damaged by fire (?); portions of Pss. 142 and 143 are destroyed. Fol. 129 is severely damaged by rodents. Part of text of Song 1 is destroyed or barely legible.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: I(12/fols. 1r-11v) – II(10/fols. 12r-21v) – III(10/fols. 22r-31v) – IV(10/fols. 32r-41v) – V(10/fols. 42r-51v) – VI(10/fols. 52r-61v) – VII(10/fols. 62r-71v) – VIII(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; s.l.: 8, stub after 3/fols. 72r-81v) – IX(10/fols. 82r-91v) – X(10/fols. 92r-101v) – XI(10/fols. 102r-111v) – XII(10/fols. 112r-121v) – XIII(10/fols. 122r-131v) – XIV(10/fols. 132r-141v) – XV(7; s.l.: 3, stub after 4; 4, stub after 4; 5, stub after 2/fols. 142r-148v) – B(1; s.l.: 1, stub before 1/fol. 149).

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 3r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data are for fol. 136r.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: Texts I-4, I-5: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Numeral ፮ “six” looks like compressed numeral ፯ “seven” (e.g., fols. 59r and 60r).

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; letter እ in the word እስመ in Ps. 135; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 148; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150; etters ባ and ክ of the word ይባርክዎ in Canticle 10; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A group of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4.

abbreviations.abbreviation: Text I-3 እ፡ for እስመ፡ ለዓለም፡ ምሕረቱ፡ (Ps. 135, fols. 105v-106r) ስ፡ for ስቡሕኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ወልዑልኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ (Canticle 10, fols. 124v-125r) Text I-4 ሰ፡ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት Words or their abbreviations stand for the whole refrain: ሠ፡/ሰ፡ for ሠረቀ፡ በሥጋ፡ እምድንግል፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ዘርአ፡ ብእሲ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 135ra-va) እ፡ for እስመ፡ በፈቃዱ፡ ወበሥምረቱ፡ አቡሁ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መጽአ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 135vb-136vb) ኵ፡/ኵሉ፡ for ኵሉ፡ ትውልድ፡ ያስተበፅዑኪ፡ ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ (fols. 137rb-138rb) ነዓ፡/ነዓብ፡ for ነዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። እስመ፡ ሣህልኪ፡ ይኵን፡ ላዕለ፡ ኵልነ (fols. 139va-140ra) ተ፡/ተፈ፡/ተፈሥ፡ for ተፈሥሒ፡ ኦምልዕልተ፡ ጸጋ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኪ፡ ሞገስ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ (fols. 141rb-142vb) ነዓ፡ for ነዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። እስመ፡ ሣህልኪ፡ ይኵን፡ ላዕለ፡ ኵልነ (fol. 142rb-vb) Text I-5 ወ፡ ሣ፡ ይ፡ ሰ፡ ቅ፡ for ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፈለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት The abbreviations stand for the whole refrain: ወ፡/ወበ፡/ወበእን፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 143vb-146va)

otherdetails.otherdetail: Traditional interpretation of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 is missing.

edition.text: TÄSFA GÄBRÄ ŚǝLLASE zä-bǝḥerä Bulga, Mäzmurä Dawit. Ṡälotatä näbiyat, wä-mäḫalǝyä Sälomon, wǝddase Maryam mǝslä anqäṣä bǝrhan…, Addis Abäba 1991 (and other editions); K. STOFFREGEN-PEDERSEN, Traditional Biblical Exegesis of the Book of Psalms, Wiesbaden 1995 (AeF 36).

desccontent.details:
The Ethiopic Psalter usually includes:

I) Mäzmurä Dawit "Psalms of David";
II) Mäḥaləyä näbiyat "The Canticles of the Prophets";
III) Mäḥaləyä mäḥaləy "Song of Songs";
IV) Wəddase Maryam “Glory of Mary”;
V) Anqäṣä bərhan “The Gate of Light”.
The Anqäṣä bərhan is missing in the Ms.

edition.text: K. STOFFREGEN-PEDERSEN, Traditional Biblical Exegesis of the Book of Psalms, Wiesbaden 1995 (AeF 36); TÄSFA GÄBRÄ ŚǝLLASE zä-bǝḥerä Bulga, Mäzmurä Dawit. Ṣälotatä näbiyat, wä-mäḫalǝyä Sälomon, wǝddase Maryam mǝslä anqäṣä bǝrhan…, Addis Abäba 1991 (many different editions).

desccontent.itranslation:
Interpretation of the righteous and of the sinful.

Psalms of David.
Ps. 1:1.

desccontent.text: II) Mäḫalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets”

edition.text: TÄSFA GÄBRÄ ŚǝLLASE zä-bǝḥerä Bulga, Mäzmurä Dawit. Ṣälotatä näbiyat, wä-mäḫalǝyä Sälomon, wǝddase Maryam mǝslä anqäṣä bǝrhan…, Addis Abäba 1991 E.C.

desccontent.details:
First Song of Moses (Ex. 15:1–19): fols. 116r-117r;

Second Song of Moses (Deut. 32:1–21): fols. 117r-118v;
Third Song of Moses (Deut. 32:22–43): fols. 118v-120r;
Song of Hannah (I Sam. 2:1–10): fols. 120r-121r;
Prayer of Hezekiah (Is. 38:10–20): fols. 121r-121v;
Prayer of Manasseh (apocryphal): fols. 121v-122v;
Song of Jonah (Jon. 2:3–10): fols. 122v-123r;
First Song of the Three Youths in the Furnace (Dan 3: 28–45): fols. 123r-124r;
Second Song of the Three Youths (Dan 3: 52–56): fols. 124r-124v;
Third Song of the Three Youths (Dan 3: 57–88): fols. 124v-125r;
Song of Habakkuk (Hab 3: 1–19): fols. 125v-126v;
Song of Isaiah (Is 26: 9–20): fols. 126v-127r;
Song of Our Lady Mary (Lk 1: 46–55): fols. 127v;
Song of Zachariah (Lk 1: 68–79): fols. 127v-128r;
Song of Simeon (Lk 2: 29–32): fol. 128r-128v

desccontent.text: III) Mäḫalǝyä mäḫalǝy “The Song of Songs”

edition.text: Edition: TÄSFA GÄBRÄ ŚǝLLASE zä-bǝḥerä Bulga, Mäzmurä Dawit. Ṡälotatä näbiyat, wä-mäḫalǝyä Sälomon, wǝddase Maryam mǝslä anqäṣä bǝrhan…, Addis Abäba 1991 E.C. Edition and translation: H.C. GLEAVE, The Ethiopic Version of the Song of Songs, London 1951.

Edition: TÄSFA GÄBRÄ ŚǝLLASE zä-bǝḥerä Bulga, Mäzmurä Dawit. Ṡälotatä näbiyat, wä-mäḫalǝyä Sälomon, wǝddase Maryam mǝslä anqäṣä bǝrhan…, Addis Abäba 1991 E.C. Edition and translation: K. FRIES, ወዳሴ፡ ማርያም. Weddâsê Mârjâm. Ein äthiopischer Lobgesang an Maria nach mehreren Handschriften, Upsala 1892. VelMe I, 76-91; II, 284-296. Translation: BLedMH 279-296.

desccontent.incipit: Fol. 135ra, l.1: ውዳሴ፡ በሰኑይ። ፈቀደ፡ እግዚእ፡ ያግዕ[sic] ፡ ለአዳም፡ ኅዙነ፡ ወትኲዘ፡ ልብ፡ ወያግብኦ፡ ኀበ፡ ዘትካት፡ መንበሩ፨ ሰአ፡ ቅድስት፨
desccontent.itranslation: [Fol. 135ra, l.1]: Praise on Monday. The Lord wished to liberate Adam, sad and aggrieved at heart, and reinstate him to his throne of old. Pr[ay for us], O Holy One!
desccontent.explicit: Fol. 146vb, l.9: ያጽንዓነ፡ በርትዕት፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ውስተ፡ አሚነ፡ ዚአሁ፡ ወዘአቡሁ፡ ወዘቅዱስ፡ መንፈሱ፡ ይጸግወነ፡ ሣህሎ፤ ወምሕረቶ፤ ይሥረይ፡ ኃጢአተነ፡ በብዝኃ፡ ምሕረቱ፨ ስብሐት፡ ለኪ፡ ኦወላዲተ፡ እግዚአ፡ ኲሉ፡ አኰቴት፡ ወክብር፡ ለአብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ይእዜኒ፡ ወዘልፈኒ፡ ወለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ወአሜን። ለይኩን፡ ለይኩን፡ ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፍለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፨፨
desccontent.etranslation: [Fol. 146vb, l.9]: May he strengthen us in the Orthodox faith, in the faith in himself, in his Father and in his Holy Spirit. May he bestow upon us his benevolence and his mercy; may he heal our sins by his abundant mercy. Praise be to you, O Mother of the Lord of all. Gratitude and glory be to the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit, now and forever and unto the ages of ages. Amen and amen. May it be! May it be! May your Son bestow upon us from his benevolence. Pray for us, O Holy One!

additional.tran: Fol. 147r: This (is) the Psalter which wäyzaro Wälättä Sǝllase donated to Mädḫanä ˀAläm ˀAddǝgrat; and her father (is) Täsfa Maryam, and her mother Wälättä Ḥǝywät, and her husband ˀArˀaya Sǝllase; in the year of John the Evangelist, 19 Ḫǝdar 1928 year of mercy. The seller is priest Dästa Gäzzahäňň from ˀAddǝgrat, the purcheser is haläqa Kǝhšän Sǝnqe from ˀAddǝgrat, the guarantor is he himself,  the witness is priest Täklä Haymanot Baddäru,  haläqa Gäbräsǝllase, haläqa Täsämma Kidanu from ˀAddǝgrat. The price is eight Bǝrr. Written in the year of John, 1928 year of mercy, 9 Ṭǝqǝmt.
additional.det: The note is written in Amharic and Gǝʿǝz and is dated to 1928 year of mercy (= 1935 A.D.). It states that the donor is wäyzaro Wälättä Śǝllase for whom haläqa Kǝhšän Sǝnqe bought the Ms. from priest Dästa Gäzzahäňň for 8 Bǝrr. Also, the witnesses are mentioned.

additional.cont: Fol. 147v: Nicene Creed preceded by a short confession of fait, incomplete.
additional.add: Fol. 147va: እሰግድ፡ ለክብረ፡ መንግሥተ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስቅዱ[sic] ፡ እንዘ፡ ፩ ሰለስቱ፡ ወእንዘ፡ ሰለስቱ፡ ፩ … [fol. 147va] … ጸሎተ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ነዓም[sic]፡ በ፩አምላክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አብ፡ አሐዜ፡  ኵሉ፡ ዓለም፡ ገባሬ፡ ሰማያት፡ ወምድር፡ ዘያስተርኢ፡ ወዘኢያስተርኢ፡ ... [fol. 147vb] … ኮነ፡ ብእሴ፡ ወተሰቅለ፡ በእንቲአነ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ጲላጦስ፡ ጰንጤናዊ፡ ሐመ፡ ወሞተ፡ ወተቀብረ፡ ወተንሥአ፡ ሙታን[sic]፡ አመ፡ ሣልሥት፡ በከመ፡ ጽሑፍ፡ ውስተ፡ ቅድሳት፡ መጻሕፍት፡ አርገ፡ በስብሐት፡ ውስተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ወነበረ፡ አቡሁ፡ ዳግመ፡ ይ...
additional.det: The text is written in Gǝʿǝz with an admixture of Amharic words in the initial part. For the text of the Nicene Creed cp. MQ I, ch. 4, “Qǝddase śälästu mǝʾǝt”, §§ 1-10.

additional.cont: Fol. 149v: Excerpt from Mäḫalǝyä mäḫalǝy (“Song of Songs”, 3:11-4:5).
additional.det: The text is written on a fol. which most probably was added later. The hand seems much later than the main hand.

extras.extra: - The title ዳዊት is written in green paint on the back board. - A directive concerning the time and purpose of reciting a Ps. or a Canticle is written near their title, in Amharic, in a secondary hand: e.g., fols. 3r(ጸላት፡ በተነሳ፡ ጊዜ፡ ደግ), 4v(በታመሙ፡ ጊዜ), 17r, 20v, 107r (ቤት፡ ስትሠሩ፡ ጊሄ፡ ድ), 116r. - The Psalms are divided into groups of ten separated by a chain of red and black dots. - Omitted letters, words or passages are written interlineally in a small script: fols. 5r, 12r, 41r, 43r, 48r, 51v, 55v, 57r, 63v, 66v, 70r, 76v, 77r, 85v, 100v, 117v, 119v, 121v, 122r, 123v, 141rb, 143r, - A donation or ownership note has been erased from fol. 147ra. - Cross, in pencil: fols. 67v, 130v, 131r. - Scribbles, doodles: fols. 1r, 148rv, 149rv.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Red and white threads are inserted in the right upper corner of fol. 103.

frames.frame: Fol. 2r: elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 39v (after Ps. 50): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 78v (after Ps. 100): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 116r (after Text I-1): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 128v: chain of nine dot asterisks between the end of “The Canticles of the Prophets” and the beginning of “The Song of Songs” Fol. 134v (after Text I-3): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs, letters of Ethiopic syllabary.
